General.Name: Ethos Limited
General.Description: Ethos Limited operates a chain of watch boutiques in India. It sells watches and accessories. The company also provides watch aftercare services, including movement overhauling, battery change, ultrasonic cleaning, polishing, performance tests, parts replacement, and strap change. It also sells its products online. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Chandigarh, India. Ethos Limited is a subsidiary of KDDL Limited.
